Thank You Mr. Thomas for your help. I am new to yahoo groups and this is my=
 first post so I do not yet know the proper protocall. My name is Mark Pede=
rson and I just purchased a 17th. century wakizashi with NTHK papers rating=
 this shoto as kanteisho, the smith being Kaneyoshi of the Mino school @ Gi=
fo. Thats all I know right now but would like to know more. My scanner is n=
ot working but I do have pictures. I will try to figure out how to post the=
m. Thanks again.
